intro: Clean the world, level your gear, rise to the top.
description:
Step into the boots of a cleanup specialist on a mission to restore order to a world buried in trash. Start small with basic tools and clear low-level debris, then sell what you collect to upgrade your equipment. Each upgrade unlocks access to tougher, more valuable waste-pushing you deeper into an addictive cycle of clearing, improving, and progressing.

Explore diverse environments overflowing with discarded items, upgrade your cleaning tools through multiple tiers, and discover the thrill of transforming chaos into perfection. Simple to pick up but endlessly satisfying, this game rewards strategy, speed, and clever resource management. Clean smarter, upgrade faster, and prove you're the ultimate master of waste removal!
